SELECT cr.course_img_url, cr.course_id, cr.course_description, cr.course_name, cr.course_rating, cr.course_duration, cr.created_time, cr.updated_time, cr.course_difficulty_level, cg.category_name FROM course AS cr INNER JOIN category AS cg ON cr.category_id = cg.category_id
AND cr.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
AND cr.course_description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseDescription}, '%')
AND cr.course_difficulty_level LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseDifficultyLevel}, '%')
AND cr.course_rating LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseRating}, '%')
AND cr.popular = #{popular}
ORDER BY cr.created_time DESC
SELECT crc.created_time, crc.updated_time, crc.chapter_name, cr.course_name FROM course_chapter AS crc INNER JOIN course AS cr ON crc.course_id = cr.course_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_view (user_id, course_id, updated_time, view_count) VALUES (#{userId}, #{courseId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 1) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updated_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, view_count = view_count + 1;
